data.title: Bruce Willis
data.text:
Walter Bruce Willis (born 19 March 1955) is an American retired actor.

Quotes

[edit]

You can't undo the past but you can certainly not repeat it.

US Magazine. Issue 249.

I'm staggered by the question of what it's like to be a multimillionaire. I always have to remind myself that I am.

RS. Issue 858/859.

This is the war on terrorism; it's worth fighting for.

Bruce Willis during a visit to the 101st Airborne Division in northern Iraq, September 25, 2003. [1]

I wanted to sign up and fight with you guys, but they told me I was too old.

Bruce Willis during a visit to the 101st Airborne Division in northern Iraq, September 25, 2003. [2]

If you catch him, just give me four seconds with Saddam Hussein.

Bruce Willis during a visit to the 101st Airborne Division in northern Iraq, September 25, 2003. [3]

This is the same fight the US fought 60 years ago

Referring to the War on Terror. On Rita Cosby’s Sunday MSNBC program, November 14, 2005. [4]

The terrorists today are much the same as those we fought in WW II.

On Rita Cosby’s Sunday MSNBC program, November 14, 2005. [5]

I'm sick of answering this fucking question. I'm a Republican only as far as I want a smaller government, I want less government intrusion. I want them to stop shitting on my money and your money and tax dollars that we give 50 percent of... every year. I want them to be fiscally responsible and I want these goddamn lobbyists out of Washington. Do that and I'll say I'm a Republican... I hate the government, OK? I'm apolitical. Write that down. I'm not a Republican.[6]

Quoted by reporters at a promotional event for the film 16 Blocks[7] in early 2006

If you take one out or change one law, then why wouldn’t they take all your rights away from you?

[8]
